remarks: Property of being a polynomial.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ mplelbas as of 25-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
mplval.p $e |- P = ( I mPoly R ) $.
mplval.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
mplval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
mplval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
mplbas.u $e |- U = ( Base ` P ) $.
mplelbasOLD $p |- ( X e. U <-> ( X e. B /\ ( `' X " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) ) $.
